category.term: 233~Kobe Bryant~Los Angeles Lakers~National Basketball Association~NBA Pacific
category.label: InformQString

content.div:
Valentine's Day has a weird effect on people. Some get drunk and dial an old flame, others stuff their face full of chocolate and watch rom-coms, and, if you're Kobe Bryant, you get excused for alleged sexual assault.

Cameras caught the L.A. Lakers superstar and his estranged wife Vanessa smooching at the Staples Centre following a Laker win Tuesday, US reports.

The 33-year-old baller and his 29-year-old ex filed for divorce last December, citing irreconcilable differences, seven years after Bryant was famously accused of sexually assaulting a hotel employee in Colorado.

At the time, Bryant bought Vanessa a $4 million purple diamond ring as an apology. From the looks of things, all he needed was a bit of patience.

The couple has two kids, Natalia, 8, and Gianna, 5.

jond@dose.ca
